column2: "Due
column3: etuatsew kurow a no ho egu fi

column2: "Oenntsie EWURADZE ndze; ɔanngye ntsea; ɔammfa no werɛ annhyɛ EWURADZE mu; na ɔanntwe ammbɛn ne Nyankopɔn."
"N'asafohemfo yɛ ngyata a wɔpɔw wɔ no mu; n'atsɛmbuafo yɛ ewimbir mpataku; wonngya biribi ma ɔnnka mma adzekyee."
"No nkɔnhyɛfo yɛ ahopɔwfo
column3: ndabrabafo ara nko: n'asɔfoe egu krɔnkrɔn bea no ho fi na

column2: "EWURADZE a ɔwɔ no mu no ɔtsen; ɔrennyɛ emumuyɛ; daa n'atsɛmbu da edzi pefee
column3: onngyaa da; naaso nyia ɔnntsen dze

column2: "Metwitwa amanaman egu
column3: hɔn akoban ayeyɛ afoafo; mama hɔn abrɔn atotɔ pan
column4: ma obi nntwa mu wɔ do: wɔasɛɛ hɔn nkurow

column2: "Mekaa dɛ
column4: gye ntsea; na worunntwa wo tsenabea nnkyen
column5: dɛ mbrɛ dza mahyɛ wɔ wo ho nyina tse: naaso wɔsoɛr ahema na wɔsɛɛ wo ndzeyɛɛ nyina."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ntweɔn me
column4: nkodu da a mobɔsoɛr aba afonam do: na mo sua nye dɛ mibehyia amanaman ano
column6: dɛ mubohue m'ebufuw egu hɔn do
column7: m'ebufuhyew dzendzen nyina; na me nyinkun gya no bɛmen asaase no nyina."

column2: "Ɔno na mebɛma aman no ano krɔnkrɔn
column3: ama hɔn nyinara wɔaabɔ EWURADZE ne dzin

column2: "Etiopia esutsen egya na mo nkorɔfo a wɔapetse no fi dze ayɛyɛdze bɛba."
"Da no mu na mibeyi w'enyimguase ndzeyɛɛ a edze ato me mbra no nyina efi hɔ: na ber no mu no na mibeyi hɔn a wɔdze wo hyehyɛ hɔnho no efi wo mu
column3: na ennkɛda ho etuw woho wɔ me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no do."

column2: "Na mibegya amandzehufo na abɔbɔfo wɔ wo mu
column3: na wɔdze hɔn werɛ bɛhyɛ EWURADZE ne dzin mu."

column2: "Na Israel nkaa nnkɛyɛ emumuyɛ
column3: eso worinndzi atorsɛm; eso worunnhu ndaadaa gyirama wɔ hɔn anomu: na wɔbɛnyɛn hɔnho na woebutubutuw hɔ

column2: "Ao Zion babaa
column5: ma w'enyi ngye na fa w'akoma nyina dzi ehurusi."

column2: "EWURADZE eyi w'atsɛmbu kɔ
column3: ɔatow w'atamfo akyen: Israelhen EWURADZE no
column4: wɔ wo finimfin: erennda ho nnsuro mbusu bio."

column2: "Da no mu no wɔbɛse Jerusalɛm dɛ
"EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn wɔ wo finimfin
column3: ɔkatakyi a ɔbɛgye nkwa no a: ɔdze enyigye bedzi wo ho ehurusi
column5: ɔdze ndwom bɔbɔ wo ho ose."

column2: "Mobɔboaboa hom ano na na hom asan ebedzi afahyɛ a hom dzii ho awerɛhow no bio
"Hwɛ
column3: ber no menye hɔn a wohiahia wo ho no nyina bedzi: na mebɛgye osiifo no nkwa
column4: na matase hɔn a wɔapam hɔn no; na mebɛhyɛ hɔn enyimnyam na mama hɔn dzin
column5: hɔn a hɔn enyimguase aba asaase nyina do no a."

column2: "Ber no mu na medze hom bɛba
column3: na ber no mu na mobɔboa hom ano: na mebɛma hom enya dzin na enyimnyam wɔ asaase do aman nyinara mu
column4: ber a medze hom ndɔmmumfo bɛsan aba bio no
column5: na hom dze hom enyiwa bohu. EWURADZE na ɔse."
